text:
League 1
Rennes: Camavinga soon naturalized?
The young Rennes midfielder Eduardo Camavingo would see his naturalization record on the verge of success. Thus, it should be selectable in teams of France.
04 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Charlie Creteur



He is one of the revelations of this season 2019-2020 Ligue 1! According to the information of the team, the young midfielder of the Stade Rennais Eduardo Camavinga could in the coming hours be naturalized French. Born in Cabinda, Angola, he had already started a naturalization procedure for some time. The latter would be about to succeed. Which means that the young player of 16 years (17, November 10) could claim a place in Team France Hope. Although there is little chance to see his name appear by then, the next list of Sylvain Ripoll will be unveiled Thursday




The next opponents of Rennes:




Julien St√©phan + 14 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

07 November: CFR Cluj - Rennes
November 10: Rennes - Amiens
November 23: Dijon - Rennes
